TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CMAttitudeReferenceFrame extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: An enumeration whose values specify the reference frame from which readings are referenced.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreMotion.CMAttitudeReferenceFrame XArbitraryCorrectedZVertical = unsigned int64(2)

Docs.summary: Z axis is vertical; X axis is in any direction. Magnetometer is used to correct long-term yaw.

remarks.para: A reference frame in which the magnetometer (if available) is used to improve the long-term yaw.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreMotion.CMAttitudeReferenceFrame XArbitraryZVertical = unsigned int64(1)

Docs.summary: Z axis is vertical; X axis is in any direction.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreMotion.CMAttitudeReferenceFrame XMagneticNorthZVertical = unsigned int64(4)

Docs.summary: Z axis is vertical; X axis is magnetic north. Magnetometer is used to correct long-term yaw.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreMotion.CMAttitudeReferenceFrame XTrueNorthZVertical = unsigned int64(8)

Docs.summary: Z axis is vertical; X axis is true north. Magnetometer is used to correct long-term yaw.
